title: Balochistan governor seeks help from religious scholars to ease tensions - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Balochistan Governor Jaffar Khan Mandokhail has said that in view of the prevailing tense situation and growing political and economic challenges in the region, the guidance and cooperation of Balochistan’s seasoned politicians and respected religious figures is more essential than ever.

The governor expressed these views during a meeting with JUI-F Secretary General, Senator Maulana Ghafoor Haideri at the Governor House on Friday.

The governor emphasised the pivotal role played by Balochistan’s senior political leaders and religious scholars in navigating past crises and said they consistently promoted political engagement, launched collective movements for provincial rights and offered viable political solutions to emerging challenges.

“Through mutual understanding and awareness of each other’s difficulties, we can move towards lasting solutions,” the governor said and stressed the urgency of taking concrete steps in the interest of the province and the country, especially considering the escalating tensions in the region.

“We cannot afford further hatred and conflict,” the governor warned.

Published in Dawn, April 12th, 2025
